  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    AddTrustedReviewerPage
    This page allows students to search for reviewers that are not on their trusted reviewer list and select as many as they want to add to that list.
    FirstPage
    FirstPage class represents the initial screen for the first user.
    InstructorHomePage
    The InstructorHomePage class provides an interface for instructors to manage reviewer requests.
    InvitationPage
    InvitationPage class represents the page where an admin can generate an invitation.
    PrivateMessageConvoPage
    Represents the private message conversation page.
    PrivateMessagePage
    Represents the page where users can send a private message in response to a specific question.
    ReplyList
    Displays page with all replies of an answer.
    SetPassPage
    SetPassPage represents the page where an admin can generate a one-time password for a selected user.
    SetupAccountPage
    SetupAccountPage class handles the account setup process for new users.
    SetupLoginSelectionPage
    Represents the initial account setup selection page.
    WelcomeLoginPage
    The WelcomeLoginPage class displays a welcome screen for authenticated users.
